nodes.title: THINK DIFFERENT!
nodes.description: DataPrep is mainly designed for notebook users. The computation is fast. The output is interactive and shareable.
nodes.subtitle: Design for Notebook Users

nodes.description: DataPrep provides high level APIs that are easy to use and easy to remember. Write a few lines of code to start the data preparation!
nodes.subtitle: Get Things Done in a Few Lines of Code

nodes.description: DataPrep is build in Python. It can be seamlessly integrated with other Python libraries.
nodes.subtitle: Integrate Seamlessly with PyData

nodes.description: DataPrep is open sourced and follows MIT licenses. You could use it free for any application!
nodes.subtitle: Embrace Open Source

nodes.description: DataPrep aims to provide the fastest and the easiest way for data scientists to prepare data in a few lines of code.
nodes.subtitle: The fastest way to do data preparation in Python

nodes.description: There are many ways to contribute to Dataprep.
nodes.title: Contribution

nodes.description: Learning DataPrep is easy whether you are a data scientists or a beginner in Python:
nodes.title: Getting Started
